const response = await client.search({
  index: "index",
  query: {
    constant_score: {
      filter: {
        bool: {
          should: [
            {
              range: {
                my_date: {
                  gte: "now-1h",
                  lte: "now-1h/m",
                },
              },
            },
            {
              range: {
                my_date: {
                  gt: "now-1h/m",
                  lt: "now/m",
                },
              },
            },
            {
              range: {
                my_date: {
                  gte: "now/m",
                  lte: "now",
                },
              },
            },
          ],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
